summary.name: Hulu
summary.description: Hulu is a streaming service launched in 2008, featuring live and on demand television and movies. Its current president is Kelly Campbell. Its headquarters is in Santa Monica, California. It is owned by The Walt Disney company, adn also produces original content.

overview.name: Hulu Beijing
overview.description: Hulu’s Beijing office has 150 full time employees and 30 interns. This location focuses on tech, primarily software development. They work with AI for content discovery, big data, security, and other software aspects of Hulu. This location has been open since 2007 in Beijing’s tech district.

location.address:
Building B, F21/22, POSCO Center, Wangjing East Park, 4th Block, Chaoyang District
No.13 Building
Beijing, P.R., China 100120, CN

overview.name: Hulu Chicago
overview.description: Hulu’s Chicago office mainly works with sales, advertising, and marketing. Some teams located there are Midwest Advertising Sales, National Sales, Local Sales, Sales Planning, Account Management, Integrated Marketing, and Research. It has been open since 2011 in Chicago’s North Side.

location.address:
415 N La Salle Dr
Chicago, Illinois 60654, US

overview.name: Hulu Detroit
overview.description: Hulu’s Detroit office is the smallest location and mainly deals with sales, with departments including Advertising Sales, Local Sales, National Sales, Sales Planning, and Account Management. It is located in the suburbs of Detroit, with an easy commute to Downtown Detroit. The office opened in 2012.

location.address:
333 W 7th St
Royal Oak, Michigan 48067, US

overview.name: Hulu New York
overview.description: Hulu’s New York office is located in the Flatiron District, and employs 190 people. This office leads the Advertising Sales department for the East Coast. It has been open since 2009.

overview.name: Hulu San Antonio
overview.description: Hulu’s Viewer Experience Center is located in San Antonio. It is the second largest office, following the Santa Monica headquarters. It had 300 employees in 2017, and expected growth up to around 380 employees. Linda Cardenas was chosen to run the Viewer Experience team at this location when it was opened in 2017.

location.address:
4511 Horizon Hill Blvd
San Antonio, Texas 78229, US

overview.name: Hulu San Francisco
overview.description: Hulu’s San Francisco office works in Advertising Sales, leading that department on the West Coast. They have been located in San Francisco’s Soma district since 2012.

location.address:
33 New Montgomery St
San Francisco, California 94105, US

overview.name: Hulu Corporate Headquarters
overview.description: Hulu’s Headquarters in Santa Monica is its largest office. There are 1,400 employees, over half of Hulu’s international workforce, and all business departments are represented. Hulu’s president, Kelly Campbell, and other top executives work here. There are three buildings, totaling 325,000 square feet. It shares a campus with HBO and other tech startups.

overview.name: Hulu Seattle
overview.description: Hulu’s Seattle office has been operating downtown since 2012 and has 200 employees. This location is engineering focused. Departments located in this office include Living Room and Mobile Viewer Experience, Backend Services, UX, Data, and more. In 2018, this office was combined with a location in Novato, California, whose employees were moved to Seattle.

overview.name: Switch Las Vegas
overview.description: Hulu partners with the company Switch for it’s data center. The data center is located in Las Vegas and uses 100% renewable energy. The facility has 12 buildings and is 2.4 million square feet. Hulu moved it’s facilities here in February 2018. This center provides an energy capacity of up to 55 kW per rack, and it is estimated that Hulu eliminated 256,000 tons of carbon emissions by moving here.

location.address: 7135 S Decatur Blvd, Las Vegas, NV 89118
